    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        public static TcrSdk getInstance()
        The singleton
        返回:
        The singleton

      • getPluginUrl

        public static java.lang.String getPluginUrl()
        For the lightweight SDK, this method can be used to get the plugin download address.
        返回:
        The plugin download address. For the complete SDK, this method will return `null`.

      • setLogger

        public void setLogger(TcrLogger mLogger)

        Set the log callback object and level.
        SDK logs will be printed to a temporary file and the system's standard log output (i.e., Logcat) by default for problem locating and analysis.
        You can set your own TcrLogger to customize the log printing function

        Note: This method can be called before `#init()`.
        参数:
        mLogger - A TcrLogger created by yourself

      • init

        public void init(Context ctx,
                 java.lang.String pluginPath,
                 AsyncCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Initialize the SDK.
        参数:
        ctx - The Android context, which cannot be `null`.
        pluginPath - The file path of the SDK plugin. You must pass in a valid plugin path for the lightweight SDK or `null` or `""` for the complete SDK.
        callback - The callback for the plugin loading result, which cannot be `null`. You can further call other methods of the `TcrSdk` object only after the `AsyncCallback.onSuccess(Object)}` callback.
        If `TcrSdk` has been initialized, `AsyncCallback.onSuccess(Object)}` will be called back if `init()` is called back repeatedly.
        Note that the callback may be returned in an async thread.
        The error code. Valid values: `0`: The plugin didn't exist; `1`: The MD5 value of the plugin failed to be verified; `2`: The directory failed to be created; `3`: The plugin failed to be extracted; `4`: The plugin failed to be installed.

      • createTcrRenderView

        public TcrRenderView createTcrRenderView(Context context,
                                         TcrSession session,
                                         TcrRenderViewType mode)
                                  throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Create a rendering view.
        参数:
        context - The view context, which cannot be `null`.
        session - The session object `TcrSession` of the view, which cannot be `null`.
        mode - The view type, which cannot be `null`.
        返回:
        The created rendering view. `null` will be returned if creation fails. Such a failure occurs generally because the plugin failed to be initialized.
        You need to call `TcrRenderView.release()` to release underlying resources if this view is no longer needed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • createTcrSession

        public TcrSession createTcrSession(TcrSessionConfig cfg)
        Create a session object `TcrSession`.
        参数:
        cfg - The session configuration object `TcrSessionConfig`
        返回:
        The created session object. `null` will be returned if creation fails. Such a failure occurs generally as the plugin failed to be initialized.

      • getContext

        public Context getContext()
        Return the application context.
        返回:
        application context

      • getCurrentSession

        public TcrSession getCurrentSession()
        Return the current session.
        返回:
        The current session
